options.optionText: Hey, how are you holding up?
options.responseText: *looks up tired and guarded* …Why are you here?

followUpOptions.optionText: Just checking in on you.
followUpOptions.responseText: Yeah… well… guess I don’t have much to say to you right now…

followUpOptions.optionText: Thinking about the blowjob the other day?
followUpOptions.responseText: *flinches* Don’t. Just… don’t bring that up. Ever again.

followUpOptions.optionText: Why not? You seemed… into it.
followUpOptions.responseText: *glares at you, tears welling up instantly despite her anger* Don’t say that. Don’t… don’t twist it like that. It was a mistake… okay? I wasn’t thinking straight. I don’t… I don’t want to be that girl…

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re already that girl, Grace. There’s no taking it back.
followUpOptions.responseText: *looks away sharply, her voice shaking* Shut up. Just shut up. I hate you…

followUpOptions.optionText: Why don’t you want to be ‘that girl’?
followUpOptions.responseText: …Because… I’ve seen what happens to girls like that…

followUpOptions.optionText: What do you mean?
followUpOptions.responseText: *voice cracks slightly* Back at the raider brothel… the girls there… they just… stopped being people. It was like… like their souls were gone…

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re not like them, Grace.
followUpOptions.responseText: *shakes her head quickly* You don’t get it… that’s what they all thought at first… until they didn’t think anything at all anymore…

followUpOptions.optionText: Why does it scare you so much?
followUpOptions.responseText: *tiny sob escapes her lips* Because I don’t want to end up like them… just… used… broken… something people touch and throw away when they’re bored…

followUpOptions.optionText: What do you want then?
followUpOptions.responseText: …I just… I want to be happy… I want someone to… actually care about me… not… just my body…

followUpOptions.optionText: You think I’m like them? The raiders?
followUpOptions.responseText: *looks up at you* I don’t know… I want to think you’re not… but… I don’t know anymore…

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m not like them. I promise. I… care about you, Grace.
followUpOptions.responseText: *breathes shakily* Don’t… don’t lie to me… please… I can’t handle it if you’re lying…

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m not lying. I’ll be here. You’re not alone anymore.
followUpOptions.responseText: *silent tears slip down her cheeks as her shoulders shake* …Don’t leave me… please… just… don’t leave me…

followUpOptions.optionText: I’ll protect you. Even if you hate me for everything else I’ve done.
followUpOptions.responseText: *looks down* I… I don’t hate you… I just… don’t know how to feel about you…

followUpOptions.optionText: Honestly? I don’t care what you think. You’re just my little cocksleeve now.
followUpOptions.responseText: *her eyes widen in horror* No… no… I’m not… I’m not that… I’m not…

followUpOptions.optionText: Get used to it. Next time, I’m shoving my cock down your throat whether you want it or not.
followUpOptions.responseText: *shakes her head violently, tears streaming down her face*
followUpOptions.advanceDayWithStatusMessage: Grace bolts for the door, sobbing uncontrollably as she runs down the hallway, leaving you alone.

followUpOptions.optionText: Don’t act like you didn’t like it.
followUpOptions.responseText: *trembles* I didn’t… I mean… maybe… no… I don’t know… god, just leave me alone… please…

followUpOptions.optionText: How about we pick up where we left off? Go further this time.
followUpOptions.responseText: *shakes her head violently* No. No… I’m not… I’m not doing that again… I can’t… I don’t want to…

followUpOptions.optionText: Fine. Another time, then.
followUpOptions.responseText: *breathes out shakily* …Whatever… just… go…

options.optionText: Thinking about… what happened the other day?
options.responseText: *groans softly* Can we not talk about that? I already feel like dying every time I remember…

followUpOptions.optionText: If it makes you feel better… it’s normal. Really.
followUpOptions.responseText: Yeah, well… normal or not, I still feel like a total idiot. I don’t even know why I… ugh, never mind. I just didn’t think anyone would actually walk in… you know.

followUpOptions.optionText: You’ve been avoiding me since then.
followUpOptions.responseText: *lets out a nervous laugh* Well… yeah. Can you blame me? Every time I see your face I just remember… you know. That. And my brain melts and my mouth stops working.

followUpOptions.optionText: You know… there are better ways to feel good than just using your fingers.
followUpOptions.responseText: *eyes snap up, wide and flustered* Wh-what the hell is that supposed to mean?! Are you seriously… suggesting… sex…?

followUpOptions.optionText: Yeah. Sex feels better than fingers ever could.
followUpOptions.responseText: *hugs her knees tighter, shaking her head quickly* N-no way. That… that sounds painful. Everyone says the first time hurts like hell. I’m not… I’m not ready for that.

followUpOptions.optionText: It doesn’t have to hurt. But fine… we could start with something easier.
followUpOptions.responseText: *peeks up hesitantly* Easier…? Like… what?

followUpOptions.optionText: Another lesson. Just… looking. Touching. Learning.
followUpOptions.responseText: *face burns red instantly* God… you’re… you’re unbelievable… but… I… I guess… it wouldn’t… hurt… to just… look… right?

followUpOptions.optionText: Exactly. Come here. You’re just learning. Nothing scary.
followUpOptions.responseText: *shuffles closer reluctantly* Right… learning… totally normal… I can’t believe I’m doing this… god…

followUpOptions.optionText: Go ahead. Take it out and… wrap your hand around it, slowly.
followUpOptions.responseText: *gulps audibly, eyes widening* Wh-what… like… actually… touch it…? *breathes shakily, her small hand hovering before finally wrapping around your dick* Oh my god… it’s… warm… and… so weird…

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re doing great. Try… stroking it a little.

followUpOptions.optionText: That’s because you’re turning me on.
followUpOptions.responseText: *lets out a shaky, nervous laugh* Don’t… don’t say that… it makes my head feel funny…

followUpOptions.optionText: Want to see how it tastes?
followUpOptions.responseText: *eyes snap up to yours, horrified and curious all at once* T-taste it…? You’re… you’re insane…

followUpOptions.optionText: Come on. It won’t hurt. Just a little lick.

options.optionText: I’m sensing some mixed signals here, in regard to the lesson earlier.
options.responseText: The only signal you should be sensing is: RUN. FAR AWAY. Preferably back to the Shame Chamber where you belong.

followUpOptions.optionText: Hey, at least I tried! You’re welcome for the lesson.
followUpOptions.responseText: A ‘lesson’?! Oh, I learned something, alright. I learned that you’re the *last person* I’d want teaching me anything. Ever.

options.optionText: What do you think of the vault?
options.onlyDisplayIfObjectiveComplete: Get a vault suit for Grace.
options.responseText: It’s... definitely not what I expected. I mean, I’m glad to be safe, but some of the rules here are kinda bonkers. Like, no holding hands? No touching at all? People keep saying it’s ‘for science,’ but I think they’re all just being really silly.

followUpOptions.optionText: Yeah, this place is pretty strict.
followUpOptions.responseText: Right? Like, I get it—don’t murder anyone, don’t steal food—but ‘no private time’ is a bit much.

followUpOptions.optionText: Maybe they have a good reason for the rules?
followUpOptions.responseText: Maybe? I mean, I’ve heard the whole ‘no-fap energy’ pitch, but... uh, what does ‘fap’ mean exactly? Everyone keeps saying it like I’m supposed to know, but nobody explains it.

followUpOptions.optionText: It means... taking care of yourself, privately.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, like brushing your hair or something? Wait, no, that doesn’t sound right. Why would they make a rule about that?

followUpOptions.optionText: It’s, uh, something people do when they’re alone and... excited.
followUpOptions.responseText: Excited? Like, happy? I get happy when I’m alone sometimes. Is that bad?

followUpOptions.optionText: It’s when someone touches their dick or pussy to feel good, you know, sexually.
followUpOptions.responseText: WAIT, WHAT?! Uh, people do that? WHY?

followUpOptions.optionText: You’ve seriously never done it?
followUpOptions.responseText: No! Why would I? I mean, I’ve never even thought about it. Is it supposed to feel good or something?

followUpOptions.optionText: Yes, most people feel really good doing it.
followUpOptions.responseText: Huh... I guess I just never thought about it. Is it really that big of a deal for people?

followUpOptions.optionText: Well, if you ever want to, just don’t get caught here.
followUpOptions.responseText: Wait, they actually catch people doing that? What do they even do if someone gets caught?

followUpOptions.optionText: Want me to show you how it’s done?
followUpOptions.responseText: Wait, what? Show me? Are you serious? That’s... that’s so weird! But... you’re kidding, right?

followUpOptions.optionText: No, I'm serious. Look. [Drop your pants]
followUpOptions.responseText: WAIT. WHAT?! EHH?! OH MY GOD, WHAT IS THAT?! WHY IS IT STARING AT ME?!

followUpOptions.optionText: Relax, it’s just a cock, girl.
followUpOptions.responseText: COCK?! COCK?! IT’S A FREAKING VEINY MUTANT MOLE RAT! PUT IT AWAY BEFORE I VOMIT EVERYWHERE!! THAT'S IT! I'M OUTTA HERE!
followUpOptions.advanceDayWithStatusMessage: Grace ran straight to the Overseer screaming about 'veiny mutant mole rat' and now you're spending the rest of the day in the Shame Chamber—staring at a wall while a voice from TV repeats 'Bad Vault Dweller.' on loop.

followUpOptions.optionText: What do you think of your room?
followUpOptions.responseText: It’s… small. And plain. I guess it beats a raider camp, though. At least it doesn’t smell like jet and piss.

followUpOptions.optionText: It’s just temporary. We’ll get you back to your dad soon.
followUpOptions.responseText: Right, back to Dad. I’m sure he’s worried...

options.optionText: Here's your vault suit. Behold its glorious, skin-tight perfection.
options.markObjectiveComplete: Get a vault suit for Grace.
options.onlyDisplayIfHasObjective: Get a vault suit for Grace.
options.responseText: Whoa, uh, what? Why did you say it like that? You’re... weird. Seriously, this place is full of weirdos. Look, I’ll put it on, just... stop looking at me like that, okay?

options.optionText: Why are you still in your underwear?
options.dontDisplayIfHasObjective: Get a vault suit for Grace.
options.dontDisplayIfObjectiveComplete: Get a vault suit for Grace.
options.responseText: Oh! Uh... is that a problem? Nobody’s given me anything else to wear, and I’m not exactly raiding closets here. Do people actually wear those funny blue jumpsuits all the time?

followUpOptions.optionText: I’ll find you a vault suit. Just... stay put for now.
followUpOptions.addObjective: Get a vault suit for Grace.
followUpOptions.responseText: A vault suit? Oh, you mean those tight, shiny things everyone’s wearing? Well, sure. Guess it’s better than this, right?

followUpOptions.optionText: You can’t just walk around like this. It’s distracting. Stay here, I’ll get you something.
followUpOptions.addObjective: Get a vault suit for Grace.
followUpOptions.responseText: Distracting? To who? Everyone here acts like they’ve never even seen a girl before! Fine, go grab your fancy suit thing.

followUpOptions.optionText: Honestly, you’re rocking it. Maybe you should just make this your signature look?
followUpOptions.responseText: Wow, thanks for the vote of confidence, but I think I’ll pass.

options.optionText: We need to talk about your plans. Are you still thinking about going back to your dad?
options.responseText: I mean, I guess that’s the plan? Unless… you think it’s not safe? I’ve seen what’s out there, and it’s... terrifying.

followUpOptions.optionText: It’s not safe yet. I need time to clear the road.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh. Well, I guess staying here a bit longer won’t hurt. At least you’re not, like, throwing me back to the Raider Sluts. Thanks for that, by the way.

followUpOptions.optionText: Honestly, I think you’d be better off staying here for good.
followUpOptions.responseText: Here? For good? I mean, it’s not terrible, but what about my dad? What if he thinks I’m dead? What if he’s waiting for me?

followUpOptions.optionText: I met your dad. He’s... not a nice guy.
followUpOptions.responseText: What? What do you mean? He’s always been... I mean, he’s strict, sure, but... he's still my dad. Did he say anything about me?

followUpOptions.optionText: He didn't seem like losing you was a big deal for him. You deserve better than that.
followUpOptions.responseText: He didn't...? I... That really hurts. I kept hoping I was wrong about how distant he got after Mom died. Maybe I’ve been clinging to a person long gone.

followUpOptions.optionText: What happened to your mom?
followUpOptions.responseText: She died when I was little. Bandit raid. Dad never forgave the world for taking her. I think... something broke in him after that. He turned everything into walls and rules. Love didn’t survive the cutbacks.

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re safe here. You don’t need to chase someone who won’t come looking for you.
followUpOptions.responseText: Yeah... maybe you’re right. It’s just hard to let go. But if I’m being honest, this place already feels more like home than anywhere else I’ve been.

options.responseText: Oh, okay! Uh, don’t be a stranger, alright? I mean, it’s not like I have anyone else to talk to here... yet.
